# MissionCanvas Action Brief

Date: 2026-02-18
Route: RIU-073 - Debug & Recovery
Primary Agent: Raptor (Debug)

## Input
Objective: Design healthcare + workforce + public policy rollout plan
Context: Need shared governance and role clarity across domains
Desired Outcome: Integrated routing and artifact plan for mixed objectives
Constraints: Timeline fixed at 90 days for pilot readiness

## Execution
One-Way Door: None detected
Next Artifact: Root-Cause + Fix Plan
Immediate Action: Identify failure point and define minimal corrective action.

## Checks
- Verify convergence completeness
- Verify reversibility before execution
- Validate first artifact quality
